alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 10:37AM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches above 4,500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From 1 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and Wind may adversely impact travel. JPK
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
